post.body: I hear ya! Let me know once you do and if i can be of any help to you! 1st you need to get better! ; )
When you do feel up to it, try out the workouts I sent you. They can all be done at home...unless you like to get away : )
OMG ~ you are too funny! While I am sure the wine would have bee icing on the cake! Well I wish you a super fast recovery!
What happened??
Hope you are okay! I need to sneak a workout in this morning, otherwise this day is Too busy! ; )
My Dad lives in NW Indiana...near Rensselaer, Valpo, Hebron... yep, was hit by the same storm. You had lots of damage too?
Thanks Joyce - i was actually quoting one of the women I work with...ran out of room to add her name. I'm sure she'd agree ; )
I LOVE my America's Premiere Experts Fleece!!! Keeping me warm and cozy tonight!
I feel bad...my dad is all by himself...67 and told me the house got down to 38 degrees!!! All is good now. We'll go up Jan
I can't wait!!!
BTW...what kind of sled will fit you ? ; )
I'll be looking forward to this video!
Thanks!!! Oh Spring will be a great time for Disney! Have you been before?
Sure do not - I am sure I will post it with a photo when I get my hands on it! Fingers crossed for good weather! Stay warm!!!
Thanks so much Ryan! Can't wait to actually see it...since it's only in the Cincinnati area right now. Ready for the holidays?
Sitting down to a big cup of hot peppermint tea. Perfect for a super cold morning Cannot wait til Thursday and spending time in Florida!
Chat soon @ResourcefulMom, @wbaustin, @clarky07
Fat Loss Journey wisdom shared by Fit Yummy Mummy Cecile.
"Maybe my fat loss journey isn't so much about losing fat-it's about me learning discipline, self control, humility, persistence, patience"
http://twitpic.com/vckl - The ice storm at my dad's - he was without power for 3 days...prevented us from going up to celebrate Xmas.
